title: Senior Technical Researcher/Engineer
body:
Location: Poland

We Are:RTB House is a global company that provides state-of-the-art marketing technologies for top brands and agencies worldwide. Its proprietary ad-buying engine is the first in the world to be powered entirely by Deep Learning algorithms, enabling advertisers to generate outstanding results and reach their goals at every stage of the funnel.

You Will:As a Senior Technical Researcher/Engineer within the AdTech Technical Research Team, you'll play a pivotal role in exploring and understanding the latest technologies in the ad tech domain. You'll be responsible for conducting in-depth research, experimenting with new technologies, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to assess their potential for integration into our systems. Your role will involve a blend of programming, research, and analytical skills to evaluate the effectiveness and feasibility of various ad tech solutions.

Desired Experience:

  • 5+ years of experience as researcher or engineer.

  • Strong technical proficiency: programming skills and the ability to understand large and complex systems and architectures.

  • Openness and willingness to experiment & learn: readiness to take on new challenges, explore new technologies, and continuously expand knowledge in the ad tech domain.

  • Independence & proactive attitude: ability to take initiative, make decisions, and act without excessive supervision while maintaining a high standard.

  • Goal-oriented mindset: focus on achieving specific project goals and adaptability in a dynamic environment.

  • Collaboration & communication: ability to work effectively with teammates and other teams, clearly sharing knowledge and cooperating with external organizations (e.g. major browser vendors, W3C, GitHub discussions).

  • Ability to build Proof of Concepts (PoCs): creating prototypes and experimental solutions to evaluate effectiveness and utility.

Selected Technologies & Projects:

  • Python, Java, Scala, TypeScript/JavaScript

  • PyTorch, NumPy, Pandas

  • Jupyter Notebooks

  • BigQuery, GCP

  • Browser Engines

  • Assessing new privacy mechanisms (e.g. Privacy Sandbox APIs) by building PoCs, testing, and suggesting improvements (via GitHub issues or meetings). The goal is to evaluate their feasibility, ensure compliance, and enhance user privacy.

  • Exploring solutions for Android and iOS, including creating prototypes to improve performance on mobile platforms. This requires close collaboration with other teams and leveraging ML opportunities.

  • Many more — including your own ideas!

 

We Offer:

  • Compensation: an attractive salary and career growth opportunities

  • Technology: access to the latest technologies and real opportunity to use of them in a large-scale and highly dynamic projects; extensive and rich datasets

  • Impact: your contribution will directly influence the company's business results and outcomes globally, while also giving you the chance to mentor less experienced colleagues in the team

  • Wellbeing: extremely flexible conditions – you act when it is convenient for you and devote as much time as you can; you can operate fully remotely

  • Culture: be part of a team of enthusiasts with wide experience in ML who willingly share their knowledge and learnings on a daily basis, no BS environment

 

Apply now! 

You don't need to tick every box to apply. If you are passionate about digital marketing, send us your CV, and we'll review it.
informationClause: Informujemy, że administratorem danych jest RTB House z siedzibą w Warszawie, ul. Złota 61/101 (dalej jako "administrator"). Masz prawo do żądania dostępu do swoich danych osobowych, ich sprostowania, usunięcia lub ograniczenia przetwarzania, prawo do wniesienia sprzeciwu wobec przetwarzania, a także prawo do przenoszenia danych oraz wniesienia skargi do organu nadzorczego. Dane osobowe przetwarzane będą w celu realizacji procesu rekrutacji. Podanie danych w zakresie wynikającym z ustawy z dnia 26 czerwca 1974 r. Kodeks pracy jest obowiązkowe. W pozostałym zakresie podanie danych jest dobrowolne. Odmowa podania danych obowiązkowych może skutkować brakiem możliwości przeprowadzenia procesu rekrutacji. Administrator przetwarza dane obowiązkowe na podstawie ciążącego na nim obowiązku prawnego, zaś w zakresie danych dodatkowych podstawą przetwarzania jest zgoda. Dane osobowe będą przetwarzane do czasu zakończenia postępowania rekrutacyjnego i przez okres możliwości dochodzenia ewentualnych roszczeń, a w przypadku wyrażenia zgody na udział w przyszłych postępowaniach rekrutacyjnych - do czasu wycofania tej zgody. Zgoda na przetwarzanie danych osobowych może zostać wycofana w dowolnym momencie. Odbiorcą danych jest serwis Just Join IT oraz inne podmioty, którym powierzyliśmy przetwarzanie danych w związku z rekrutacją.
